name: Lumber, softwood, borate treated, PNW
description: Pressure-treated borate (disodium octaborate tetrahydrate, DOT) softwood lumber.  Base process data presented with allocations to within process co-products noted.  Refer to allocation worksheet for specifics.  All allocations performed using mass or volume., This sheet sets out each unit process in the production of one cubic meter of borate surfaced pressure treated softwood lumber as produced in the US Pacific Northwest Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has  undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet  undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.; Geography: US Pacific Northwest

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

exchanges.description:
17.0 nominal BF = 1 acutal cubic feet (ft3); 1 nominal BF = 0.0588 ft3

retention 0.3060 lb/ft3 = 4.92 kg/m3, dry basis
